title: Stuyvesant High School
summary: Stuyvesant High School (pronounced /ˈstaɪvɪsənt/),[8] commonly referred to among its students as Stuy (pronounced /staɪ/),[8][9][10] is a public magnet, college-preparatory, specialized high school in New York City, United States. Operated by the New York City Department of Education, these specialized schools offer tuition-free accelerated academics to city residents.
